name: Fly Plane (virtual3ed)
description: Fly Plane is awesome new 3D Airplane Simulator game. As a Fly Plane 3D pilot, your job is to steer a 3D plane through all of the waypoints and reach the correct destination. Try not to crash the plane or else you will lose! Improve your piloting skills in best airplane game. Play the latest Enjoy aeroplane flying in the best free flight simulator game. Ever wanted to become a pilot? Now you can fulfill your dream of flying aero plane by playing this flying simulation game as maverick. Conquer the skies in your Airplane 2020! Airplane controls in flying game are easy to use. As a pilot of airliner, you should be ready to cope with emergency situations conditions.
